title: Second-Chance Cats: True Stories of the Cats We Rescue and the Cats Who Rescue Us
description: There's no feeling quite like that of getting a second chance and a fresh start. When we adopt a homeless cat--or that cat decides to adopt us--we're not just giving one of earth's most beautiful and inscrutable creatures a chance at a good life, we're giving ourselves the gift of companionship, solace, and love. And plenty of laughter too!This heartwarming collection includes more than 30 true, contemporary stories told by a variety of writers, including Melody Carlson, Lauraine Snelling, and Kristin Billerbeck. Each feel-good story involves cat rescue, some in a typical way and others in surprising--even miraculous--ways. Sometimes the question Really, who rescued whom?A thoughtful gift for the cat lover in your life, Second-Chance Cats is the purr fect companion for cozy nights, lazy weekends, and any time you need a pick-me-up.
author: Callie Smith Grant
